entry.title: Monday: Snow. High minus 11.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 11. Wind chill near minus 19. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of light snow. High minus 15.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending in the morning then mainly cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 29 in the morning and minus 21 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Monday 27 February 2023
